```{r}
f <- function(x) {
  return (x^3 + 4*x^2 - 10)
}
a <- 1
f(a)
```
```{r}
b <- 2
f(b)
```
```{r}
bisection <- function(f, a, b) {
  i <- 1
  p <- (a+b)/2
  error <- 1
  while(f(p) != 0 && error > 0.0001){
    if(f(a)*f(p) > 0) {
      a <- p
    } else {
      b <- p
    }
    p1 <- (a+b)/2
    error <- abs(p1-p)/abs(p1)
    p <- p1
    i <- i + 1
  }
  print('iterasi ke-')
  print(i)
  return(p)
}

bisection(f, a, b)
```
